segments.text: The sunlight fills this kitchen, yet somehow I feel a shadow creeping in with all this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s focus on that plate seems admirable, but it’s leaving everything else to rot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I watch the boy precariously balancing, and all I feel is anxiety squeezing my chest.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s eager stance makes me smile; her hope is almost tangible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, there's a bitter edge to that happiness, knowing they’re breaking rules.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a simple act—just cookies—but it feels so loaded with implications.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could just freeze this moment, a snapshot of innocence before the impending mess unfolds.
segments.speaker: PAR
